title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete the propulsion system design analysis for the new aircraft.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion process of a jet engine and submit findings.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a nozzle for high-speed propulsion.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Take a quiz on aerodynamics principles and calculations.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze fluid flow through various systems and submit your report.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Conduct thermal analysis on heat exchangers and present your findings.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural system for an aerospace project with detailed specifications.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform orbital mechanics calculations for a satellite mission.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Take the final exam for systems engineering, covering all course materials.
